name: Brett Ramsey
text: Picked up some of Tony’s Spicy salsa this weekend and it is hands down the best salsa I have ever had

resp.text: Thanks Brett! We make each cup with love! Welcome to your new addiction.

name: Veronica York
text: The world's best salsa.! I agree 💯

name: Nakia Lloyd
text: Just purchased from Whole Foods and my family loves this salsa! Very fresh tasting!

name: jessie stephens
text: I met this gentleman at a convenient store in east Tennessee. He was wearing a Tony Tejas shirt, and I asked him about his product. He said they made the best salsa. He gave me a sample of the mild blend. I have to say it is an excellent salsa. It's not too chunky, the same powerful flavors in every bite. Their product is the best. Unfortunately we don't have a market that sells their brand yet, but I'll be keeping an eye out for it. I'm wanting to try the spicy blend next. Thank You to the nice gentleman that introduced me to some new flavor.

resp.text: My pleasure. You met me Chef Tony Tejas owner & creator. I will hook you up next I'm there

name: Kevin Hebert
text: Just know they stopped selling it where I live,the owner himself set up a way for me to get more salsa and responsed to my emails faster than any company ever has. The best customer service,oh and of course the best salsa I’ve ever eaten. Didn’t even like salsa before this. Honestly outstanding 100/100.

resp.text: I appreciate your business and never want a  #salsaaddict to go without #theworldsbestsalsa

name: Jonathan McConnell
text: World's best salsa!  I thought Tony was joking when he told me that.  But he was right!  Truly a master of his trade.  I love what he has done!

resp.text: The truth will set you free and you just told it!

name: Kevin Brancati
text:
Me and my fiancè are loving your spicy salsa so much! It's so freaking delicious and REAL!

Thank you so much, Andy, for letting us try this! We'll be sure to get more in the future :)

-Kevin

resp.text: Thanks for giving us the opportunity to upgrade your lives. Andy is our sales manager and a great person. Thanks for helping us be #theworldsbestsalsa #thepeopleschamp

name: Mark B
text:
Pretty expensive for salsa, but it is insanely good. So good it's addictive. Be warned. If you try it, you'll likely become addicted too.

One day I'll crack their recipe and learn to make it myself but until then...
Let's see: lime juice, onion, cilantro, roasted tomatoes, some chilies (maybe Anchos?), salt, ....

resp.text: Thanks! Good luck on the recipe. Ha. I use only the freshest ingredients and that's why it turns you into a #salsaaddict. Enjoy #theworldsbestsalsa and check some great recipes you can cook with my salsa on my website.

name: Stan Biggs
text: Tried the Caliente Spicy at Pensacola's Palafox Marketplace a few weeks ago and wound up purchasing two containers. This salsa is incredible! I love the blend of peppers, especially with the kick from habaneros.

resp.text: Thanks! "Caliente" is my personal favorite. We are no longer attending the market, but it is available at The Apple Market and Greers in Pensacola in the deli section.

name: Karl Vanhooten
text:
Tried some at the Hoover, AL Whole Foods block party and was given a spicy container to try and review.

First impressions: bitter and way too much garlic which overwhelms the tomatoes and cilantro. Too many types of hot peppers thrown in which muddied the pepper taste (poblano, anaheim, jalapeno, habanero, serrano, red pepper flakes)  - and the result wasn't really that hot. Red pepper flakes were unnecessary and ended up in the teeth, with a bitter result.

IMHO: Do a jalapeno version, or a habanero version, or a mild poblano version, etc. - don't try to stack on  pepper tastes that conflict with another.  Could have used more cilantro leaves and some sugar or agave nectar to cut the bitterness. Haven't tried the mild version yet.

name: Nikki Gee
text: Purchased some today at Whole Foods and the whole family loves it!

name: Cindy Peck
text: Best salsa!  So fresh!  This is my new go to salsa!!!

name: Amberlee Miller
text: Amazing salsa worth the price

resp.text: Thank you! I tell people that everyday. You get what you pay for. #theworldsbestsalsa

name: Abdiaziz Dek
text: Quick in and out and easy backing...👍

name: Richard Slowik
text: I might have a bias but I love it!

name: Cris Nicco
text: Fast loading...

name: Abdishakur Mohamud
text: Very slow loading

name: Mac Freese
text: Was unloaded fairly quick nice people

name: Miley Megginson
text: This is the nastiest place I've ever seen. Trash everywhere! You'd think they could clean it up and not let it blow onto surrounding properties!!

name: Paul Smith
text: Love this place, best jalapeno corn dogs ever!

name: Ernie Staples
text: Got me unloaded fast.

name: Shawna Gulsby
text: It's good

name: Clinton Lindig
text: Load said 1330. They say 1530 for DDT. Fine ok  , normal stuff. Check back in at 1530, oh we will just call when its ready. Go figure. Workers meandering around and hadn't seen a forklift moving in over 2 hours.... avoid loads here...

name: Andrius Stankevičius
text:
Delivery. More than 3 hours on door.
I see only chilling workers here.. no rush.
Hard to find cause no building numbers exposed. Company name different than on BOL.

name: Justin Roberts
text: Been waiting for 20hrs to unload me. Was told that they might get to me today.  When my appt was 8hrs ago. Then after back in forth few hrs  with corporate they put me in a door , and still 4hrs b4 they even touched my trailer. These people are not in any kinds of hurry, even after I told them my trailer doesnt run when doors are open.and its 98° outside, trailer is now at 74°. Will not be coming back here, not will I buy anything from this company.

name: Chris Selby
text: Very fast unload a little tite on the docks but overall good place

name: denise congress
text:
BACKBREAKING WORK, PUSHING ALL THOSE CORNDOGS UP THE LINE. SUPERVISORS YELLING AT YOU TO PACK FASTER. TOO COLD AT TIMES. I DEVELOPED EAR INFECTIONS AND PNEUMONIA IN THE MIDDLE OF THE SUMMER. WHEN THEY REBUILT THE LINE TO INCREASE PRODUCTION, THEY HAD US WORKING SO CLOSE BESIDE EACH OTHER THAN BEFORE.
PERKS; 2.00 PAY RAISE EVERYONE GOT,  HOLIDAY BONUS, AND WEEKLY BONUS FOR NOT BEING LATE OR ABSENT.

name: James Tate
text: 3 hours to unload. Can park overnight in lot south side of street.

name: Check Out
text: This place i come 4:00am i check in security  the give me dock the told me go head back up door 1 after 2 hrs the told me again can you move the truck back up door 2  the hold me until  8:00am too slowly  to unloading the trailer

name: Marty Parsano
text: Appointment was at 6am go empty at 1130am

name: Rana Ashfaq
text: Quick unload.

name: Dekendrick Griggs
text: Clean up the workplace and lift 30 to 40 pounds
